links.title: VW re-imagines the '60s Microbus with this new, all-electric van
links.description: Decades after Volkswagen captured the spirit of the late '60s and early '70s with the iconic Microbus, the German automaker is hoping an updated, all-electric van will do the same thing. VW has announced it will build and sell the I.D. Buzz with the new electric van scheduled to hit showrooms in 2022.

links.title: Anglo American swims against the current in backing fuel cells
links.description: LONDON (Reuters) - Anglo American (AAL.L) is placing a contrarian bet on hydrogen fuel cell vehicles as it tries to squeeze more profit from its platinum reserves, but risks being left behind as rival miners look to cash in on battery-powered cars.

links.title: The Big Short - "Jenga" Clip (2015) - Paramount Pictures
links.description: When four outsiders saw what the big banks, media and government refused to, the global collapse of the economy, they had an idea: The Big Short. Their bold investment leads them into the dark underbelly of modern banking where they must question everyone and everything.
